text: @PGIMER Specialists: Preventive Health Care Gets Pgimer Specialists’ Backing👍🏼💡🌟It's great to see PGIMER specialists taking the initiative to engage with the public on preventive health care! 🤝🏼💕This is a brilliant move towards improving health outcomes and reducing the strain on resources. 💪🏼👏It's important to remember that prevention is better than cure, and by educating patients in peripheral areas about disease prevention, we can empower them to take control of their health. 💡🌟Kudos to PGI director Prof Vivek Lal for emphasizing the importance of this educational outreach! 👏🏼🙌The department of nephrology leading the way by sending doctors to rural centres is a great start! 💪🏼👍🏼A monthly roster and awareness talks will help patients feel at ease while interacting with the doctors. 😊👏Let's keep up the good work, PGIMER! 💪🏼🌟You're making a real difference in people's lives! 💕🤗
